subtitle: do you know that you can save the world
with meditation you're probably aware
that large groups of people meditating
can dramatically reduce crime rates in
any given area so what happens when an
overwhelmingly large number of people
all meditate together around the entire
world what if everybody just had a
meditation practice and everybody
meditated every day the whole world
would become far more peaceful wise and
harmonious practically overnight so make
it a practice for yourself to meditate
today and then tomorrow and the next day
and every day after even if you don't
want to and over the next few weeks you
will start to notice that your life just
becomes better more well ordered and you
will respond better to the situations
that befall you how do you meditate well
start by sitting down and breathing I
also recommend the app insight timer
they're not a sponsor but I wish they
were I use that app every day
